title: Subpart 366-2 - Local Solid Waste Management Plan (LSWMP) Contents
content:
Subpart 366-2 - Local Solid Waste Management Plan (LSWMP) Contents

State Regulations
§ 366-2.1 - Description of planning unit
§ 366-2.2 - Waste generation and materials recovery data
§ 366-2.3 - Existing solid waste management system
§ 366-2.4 - Existing administrative and financial structure
§ 366-2.5 - Alternatives evaluation and selection
§ 366-2.6 - Implementation plan and schedule
§ 366-2.7 - Waste stream projections

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
